attributes.name: prompt
attributes.value: Define a schema for {{ Schema.tableName }} table. Add fields to Schema.fields array with structure: {name, type, required, unique, default}. Example: {name: 'email', type: 'string', required: true, unique: true}. Add at least 5 fields.

attributes.name: prompt
attributes.value: Generate {{ Output.orm }} model code for {{ Schema.tableName }} with all fields from Schema.fields. Include field decorators for validation, uniqueness, defaults. Store in Output.modelCode.

attributes.name: prompt
attributes.value: Generate SQL migration code to create {{ Schema.tableName }} table with all Schema.fields. Use proper PostgreSQL syntax with constraints. Store in Output.migrationCode.

attributes.name: prompt
attributes.value: Generate Zod validation schema for {{ Schema.tableName }} matching all Schema.fields. Include type checking, required validation, and format validation where applicable. Store in Output.validationCode.

attributes.name: prompt
attributes.value: Compare Output.modelCode, Output.migrationCode, and Output.validationCode. Ensure field names, types, and constraints are consistent across all three. List any inconsistencies.
